name: Step in Time
description:
In this game you play as Lomza, a small time thief tasked with stealing a high tech device dubbed "Time-space Interface Matrix" (TIM) from the evil CapitalCorp in order to fund their aunts replacement legs, which she lost after being run over by the CEO of CapitalCorp.

Objective:
Get to the end of the level (green) while avoiding traps (red) and getting detected by guard bots or surveillance cameras.
Yellow optional objectives are worth 100 points each. The faster you finish the higher your score.

Controls: A/D to move and SPACE to jump

Player holds down LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to aim and release to throw their device and press E to teleport to it. Cancel aim with RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON or walk over the device to pick it up.
Dying, teleporting, or rewinding to ghost destroys any active teleporter device.

Player leaves a ghost of themselves (F) that saves their position and time at activation, then they can transport themselves back to this point (R) when they wish. Setting down a new fragment or teleporting to a fragment destroys the previously active fragment.

Final score is calculated as follows:
(Number of bonus objectives*100) + (1000 - 2*Time to complete level).
